metadata.title: CVE-2016-9152 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ecrire/exec/plonger.php in SPIP3.1.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe rac parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1').
